title: We are not the same Tamil Lyrics
stanzas:
mollamaari irukkaan
porambokku irukkaan
mudichavikki 420 irukkaan
kollakaaran irukkaan
kollai kollai adippaan
ippadithaan eththanapero iruppaan

but..
we are not the same, we are not the same
we are not the same, we are not the same
we are not the same, we are not the same
we are not the same,

dhustana kandaa thooram vilagu
ishtam irundha kooda pazhagu
illa vilagu

kaasu vanthaa koodum uravu
kashtam vandha odum piragu
uravu, odum piragu

cuz,
we are not the same we are not the same
both are not the same
we are not the same
we are not the same, we are not the same
we are not the same

payanigalin kanivaana gavanathirku
yaaraavudhu ungalidam
anbaaga pesinaal nambivida vendam
avargal kodukum biscuit
water bottle allathu thinpandangal
yethaiyum vaangi..

vaaya katti seppaan panaththa
vaari thinnum mannu ponatha
seppaan.. enna kizhippaan

koadi koadi kollai adippaan
kuvaarter kothutha nalla nadippan
kudippaan.. kooththu adippaan

but
we are not the same, we are not the same
we are not the same, we are not the same
we are not the same, we are not the same

ye stylea pesi chaina aruppaan
kaththiya kaati cellphone parippaan
parippaan... kazhutha aruppaan

ye kaalavaari mela varuvaan
poiya solli kaasa tharuvaan
varuvaan..imisa tharuvaan

mollamaari irukkaan
porambokku irukkaan
mudichavikki 420 irukkaan
kollakaaran irukkaan
kollai kollai adippaan
ippadithaan eththanapero iruppaan

we are not the same we are not the same
both are not the same
we are not the same
category: Song:We Are Not The Same - Soodhu Kavvum 2
